document.full_text: former bosnian serb army commander ratko mladic faced the u.n. war crimes tribunal on friday as a defiant general who never lost a battle, denying the charges against him as "obnoxious" and "monstrous."
document.title: mladic wary then defiant in dramatic hague debut
lines_and_colors: former bosnian serb army commander ratko mladic faced the u.n. war crimes tribunal on friday as a defiant general who never lost a battle, denying the charges against him as "obnoxious" and "monstrous."
